page.shortlink: api extension namespace uriparse class parse uri method
page.description: Parse a URI into separate parts.
page.example: dim uri as extension::URIParse uri.ParseURI("https://www.mysite.com/projectpath/index.html?firstname=john&lastname=public") ? uri.host = "www.mysite.com" ? uri.scheme = "https" ? uri.path = "/projectpath/index.html" ? uri.query = "firstname=john&lastname=public"
